videoDetails.Title: An Introduction to War Thunder  Ground Realistic Battles
videoDetails.Description:
Play War Thunder for free : 
http://warthunder.com/en/registration?r=userinvite_6945190

This is a video with recordings and commentary from the game War Thunder which is a free to play online cross-platform combat game.

This is a video from Update 1.77.2.193

This series is designed to help new people in War Thunder gain some information to enjoy the game to it's fullest. 

I am part of the War Thunder Content Partnership Program :
http://warthunder.com/en/media/partnership/

Hope you enjoy the video and have an amazing day :)
